text: We will hear arguments first this morning in 1149 Carey and Others against Piphus.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
Now, you are going beyond the damages for the denial of the hearing, the due process violation?
And you say that there are two elements of damages now to be determined one for the denial of the hearing and the other for the loss of the schooling?
